name: pict-docuserve
description: Pict Documentation Server - A single-page documentation viewer built on Pict

scripts.build: npx quack build && npx quack copy
scripts.build-site: npx quack build && npx quack copy && node build-site.js
scripts.build-examples: npx quack build && npx quack copy && node build-site.js --docs-path example_applications/todo-app/docs --output-path example_applications/todo-app/site && node build-site.js --docs-path example_applications/contacts-app/docs --output-path example_applications/contacts-app/site && node build-site.js --docs-path example_applications/sports-stats-api/docs --output-path example_applications/sports-stats-api/site

author: steven velozo <steven@velozo.com>
